Question: XRHealth Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
XRHealth Inc

Product: VR Therapy Platform

- Offers FDA-cleared virtual reality and augmented reality technology for at-home treatment of various health conditions including chronic pain, anxiety, fibromyalgia, and dementia.
- Provides virtual clinics with licensed clinicians, physical therapists, occupational therapists, social workers, and psychologists for remote treatment.
- Received $6 million funding for merger with Amelia Virtual Care and to develop an AI-based clinician for mental, physical, and occupational health treatment.
- Merged with Amelia Virtual Care to create a comprehensive XR therapeutic solution for both physical and mental health issues.
- Utilizes immersive XR technology, licensed clinicians, and advanced data analytics to provide comprehensive therapeutic care solution for patients to receive treatment from their homes.
- Offers VR therapy for physical therapy, ADHD management, occupational therapy, speech-language therapy, memory & cognitive training, pain management, post-COVID rehab, and support groups.
